title: Swift: Apple’s Next-Generation Language
content: Introduced in 2014 by Apple, Swift was designed to replace Objective-C as the primary language for iOS and macOS app development. Created under the leadership of Chris Lattner, Swift combines speed, safety, and ease of use. Its modern syntax and integration with Apple’s ecosystem make it a top choice for mobile app developers. Swift continues to grow, providing tools for seamless app creation across Apple devices.
